Gigs

Hoodstock – July 2nd 2022, Hastings

Before bringing the wonder of Executive Rock to London, Indigo Down arose from the rock music scene in Hastings in the late 90s/early 00s. It is with great joy and a little tumescence that we will be returning to our birthplace to play a reunion festival featuring many of the bands from that area and era.

Please note that this is a private event, and attendance is by invitation only. But please do visit the Hoodstock festival site or the Eventbrite page to find out how you may obtain an invite!

We’d love to see you!
